short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Gain wisdom and virtue while searching the web

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
We believe that the guiding principles of stoicism can help people in their day to day lives. By regularly viewing quotes from some of the greatest and wisest minds on a rotating basis every time you are opening a new tab to search the web, these teachings can serve as a daily reminder for living a life full of serenity, resilience and self-knowledge.

By clicking ‘Add to Chrome’ and installing this extension on your desktop, you are accepting and agreeing to install the Stoic Search Chrome extension, and understand that your browser new tab will be replaced to that provided by the service with Microsoft Bing search results, and the Privacy and Terms of Use of the extension.

Some of history’s greatest minds, along with many of today’s top performers have embraced the teachings and wisdom of the ancients stoics. Such as Marcus Aurelius, Seneca & Epictetus to name a few. Because wisdom and virtue are timeless.

Install this extension today and develop practical wisdom whilst enjoying the elegant and minimalist design, with background images of some of the greatest stoics in history, along with digital clock display.

Links:
Terms of Use: https://stoicsearch.com/terms-conditions/
Privacy Policy: https://stoicsearch.com/privacy-policy/
